Students are encouraged to join – or form – student interest groups , which include an acapella singing group, a Bollywood dance squad, and multiple sports teams. The Office of Student Affairs organizes student events throughout the year, including the Peoria Chiefs baseball game outing and the formal dinner/dance SnowBall. The Peoria area offers riverfront activities and festivals, minor league and NCAA sports, hiking and biking trails, and concerts and symphonies.
